company.name: TaxEase
company.about: TaxEase is an online tax filing platform that helps individuals and small businesses file their taxes easily and securely.

services.itr: We provide end-to-end Income Tax Return filing with expert review.
services.gst: We help businesses with GST registration and return filing.

process.tax_filing: Users upload documents, we pre-fill data, experts review, and users submit returns.

policies.privacy: We do not share customer data with third parties.
policies.security: All user data is encrypted and stored securely.

pricing.itr: ITR filing starts from ₹999 depending on complexity.
pricing.gst: GST filing starts from ₹1,499 per return.
